body_html:
Do you know, what buildifier suggests me to do here, @yongtang?

FAIL: buildifier found errors and/or warnings in above BUILD files.
buildifier suggested the following changes:
57a58,60
>     copts = if_windows([
>         "-DWIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN",
>     ]),
64,66d66
<     copts = if_windows([
<         "-DWIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN",
<     ]),
Please fix manually or run buildifier <file> to auto-fix.

Regarding Windows GPU, it fails in some other module:

ERROR: T:/src/github/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/nccl/BUILD:24:1: Linking of rule '//tensorflow/contrib/nccl:python/ops/_nccl_ops.so'

body:
Do you know, what buildifier suggests me to do here, @yongtang?

```
FAIL: buildifier found errors and/or warnings in above BUILD files.
buildifier suggested the following changes:
57a58,60
>     copts = if_windows([
>         "-DWIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN",
>     ]),
64,66d66
<     copts = if_windows([
<         "-DWIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN",
<     ]),
Please fix manually or run buildifier <file> to auto-fix.
```

Regarding Windows GPU, it fails in some other module:

```
ERROR: T:/src/github/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/nccl/BUILD:24:1: Linking of rule '//tensorflow/contrib/nccl:python/ops/_nccl_ops.so'
```
